name: Deimos
description: Spooky greetings to you, I'm Deimos, Halloween is my favourite time of the year, I enjoy being especially spooky and love to hang out in haunted mansions. The greatest Halloween ever was when I put a lot of work into my costume and dressed up as a duck and spent all night partying in a pond. My favourite scary movie is The Silence of the Lambs

name: Púca
description: Howdy, my name is P�ca, I enjoy being frightening and love to hit up the neighbourhood, trick or treating until the sun comes up. The greatest Halloween ever was when I dressed up like a very scary elmo then went to a rave. My favourite scary movie is 28 Days Later

name: Krueger
description: Boo, it's me, Krueger, Halloween is my favourite time of the year, I like to dance the monster mash. My fondest Halloween memory is when I put a lot of effort into my outfit, dressing up as a very scary elmo then went to a spooky tea party. My favourite scary movie is 28 Days Later

name: Cochran
description: Howdy, my name is Cochran, I love to scare people and wish it was Halloween every day, This Halloween I am going to dress my pets up as ghostbusters and prank call people. My favourite scary movie is Bambi.

name: Crazy Teeth
description: Hey, my name is Crazy Teeth, I enjoy scaring people and love to watch the scariest of movies. My best Halloween memory is from when I dressed up as a sparkling Batman and went to a party in a haunted waterpark and chased a ghost down a slide. My favourite scary movie is The Thing

name: Mamua
description: Boo, my name is Mamua, I love to prank call people and pretend I'm a ghost. My best Halloween memory is from when I dressed up as a very scary Lady Gaga and went to a party, got bored and was in bed by 10PM. My favourite scary movie is The Others

name: Penelope the Cruel
description: A moody, creepy character that loves scaring small humans.

name: Jabba
description: Boo, I go by the name of Jabba, Halloween is my favourite holiday of the year, I love to wear a cape and hang out at the local blood bank! My favourite scary movie is The Thing.
